about_the_game:
More of your favourite characters are coming to Peppa’s world – and they have exciting adventures to share with you! So open the door to new places, new faces, and more ways to play in My Friend Peppa Pig: Pirate Adventures.

Let’s set sail on this very special pirate adventure where you can ride aboard Captain Hog's boat and hunt for hidden treasure! Explore new locations such as Molly Mole's underground burrow, or visit Belinda Bear’s house for breakfast!

There's a whole world of new stories to experience, from dancing at Danny Dog's birthday party to play pretend on Treasure Island! Along the way, you can try activities like hula hooping, flying a kite, raising a pirate flag, talking with Polly Parrot, and over 30 more new interactions.

Your adventure awaits – what will you and Peppa Pig do next?


  • BECOME A PIRATE – Danny Dog’s party is the start of a treasure hunt across the sea!
  • PLAY IN NEW WAYS – Buzz like a bee, find a fossil, play with seashells, and try over 30 more interactions
  • FIVE NEW LOCATIONS – Including Captain Hog’s Hideout, Belinda Bear’s House, Treasure Island and more

More of your favourite characters are coming to Peppa’s world – and they have exciting adventures to share with you! So open the door to new places, new faces, and more ways to play in My Friend Peppa Pig: Pirate Adventures.

Let’s set sail on this very special pirate adventure where you can ride aboard Captain Hog's boat and hunt for hidden treasure! Explore new locations such as Molly Mole's underground burrow, or visit Belinda Bear’s house for breakfast!

There's a whole world of new stories to experience, from dancing at Danny Dog's birthday party to play pretend on Treasure Island! Along the way, you can try activities like hula hooping, flying a kite, raising a pirate flag, talking with Polly Parrot, and over 30 more new interactions.

Your adventure awaits – what will you and Peppa Pig do next?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gefoforce GT430 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported

short_description: It’s a pirate’s life for Peppa and you! Open the door to new places and faces, including Danny Dog’s party and Captain Hog’s hunt for treasure. And try over 30 more new interactions, from flying a kite to raising a pirate flag. Your adventure awaits!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
